seo.defaultDescription: AI-powered price comparison and route optimization for your grocery shopping. Save time and money every day.

home.title: Shop <1>smarter</1>, not harder
home.subtitle: Tell us what you need. Our AI scans every store nearby and finds where to shop for the least.
home.placeholder: e.g. milk, eggs, chicken for dinner tonight...

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: SmartHandel makes it easy to save money on your daily shopping.

step1.title: 1. Write what you need
step1.description: Tell us what you want, just like you would tell a friend.

step2.title: 2. We find the best prices
step2.description: Our AI checks prices in all stores near you instantly.

step3.title: 3. Save money
step3.description: Choose the cheapest store or the smartest route to save the most.

tips.title: Shopping Tips
tips.tip1: Check store apps for extra member deals.
tips.tip3: Best time to shop is usually Tuesday mornings.

home.location_error: We need your location to find stores near you.
home.geolocation_not_supported: Your browser does not support geolocation.
home.allow_location_alert: Please allow location access to search.
search_placeholders: 2 liters of milk, eggs, cheese for under 200kr
Healthy breakfast for the whole week

results.title: Results for
results.noRoutesDescription: We couldn't find any stores carrying all your items within range.

summaries.bestSingle: We found a single store that has <1>{{percent}}%</1> of your items! It's the most convenient way to shop today.
summaries.greatAlternatives: There are <1>{{count}} other stores</1> nearby that carry most of your items. Check them out below.
summaries.smartRouteBetter: By visiting <1>{{count}} stores</1>, you can save an extra <3>{{amount}}</3> compared to the best single store.
summaries.closedWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Some recommended stores are currently closed. Check opening hours before you go.

results.smartSummaryTemplate: Splitting your trip saves you <bold>{{savings}}</bold> compared to the best single store. Your total for all groceries is <bold>{{total}}</bold>.
results.smartSummarySingle: The single store option is your best bet! Splitting the trip wouldn't save you enough on groceries.

aiInsights.title: SmartHandel Insights
aiInsights.highAvailability: Availability is high for your items in this area right now.
aiInsights.priceTrend: Prices seem stable today across most major chains.
aiInsights.realTimeStatus: All status indicators (Open/Closed) are verified in real-time.

tips.title: Shopping Tips
tips.tip1: Prices are estimates and may vary in store
tips.tip2: Check store opening hours before leaving
tips.tip3: Savings are calculated against the most expensive single store

selection.title: Review your list
selection.subtitle: We identified these items from your search. Adjust quantities or remove items you don't need.

hero.title: We help people <1>save money</1> on groceries
hero.description: SmartHandel is your personal shopping assistant that uses artificial intelligence to find the cheapest items and the smartest route choices.

aiSearch.title: AI-Powered Search
aiSearch.description: Our advanced language model understands what you need, whether you write 'ingredients for taco' or a specific shopping list.

comparison.title: Price Comparison
comparison.description: We fetch real-time prices from all major grocery chains in Norway and find the cheapest combination for you.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: We only store data necessary to provide you with the results. Your position is used only to find nearby stores.

q1.question: Is it free to use?
q1.answer: Yes, SmartHandel is 100% free for consumers. We want to make price comparison accessible to everyone.

q2.question: How do you make money?
q2.answer: We explore partnerships with grocery chains and brands for featured content that does not affect the price comparison, as well as potential premium features in the future.

q3.question: Is my data safe?
q3.answer: Absolutely. We do not sell your personal data. Search history and location data are used only to generate your results and improve the service anonymously.

team.title: Meet the team
team.description: SmartHandel is developed by a small group of technology enthusiasts in Oslo who are passionate about making everyday life easier.

storeCard.noItemsFound: No items found in this store
storeCard.missingItemsWarning: Some items might be missing or prices are unavailable.

errors.generic_message: Sorry, we encountered a problem. Please try again.
errors.network_message: Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.timeout_message: The request took too long. The server might be busy.
errors.validation_message: We couldn't understand the request. Please check your input.
errors.searchFailed: Search failed. We couldn't process your request.
errors.locationsDisabled: Location services are disabled. Please enable them to find nearby stores.

layout.tagline: Your smart shopping assistant that finds the best prices and saves you time and money.

notFound.title: 404 - Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for. It might have been moved or deleted.
notFound.searchPrompt: Maybe you were looking for an item?
